intro: Psychotria morobensis, commonly known as the Morobe Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of the Pacific, specifically found in parts of Papua New Guinea and the Solomon Islands. The plant is characterized by its dark green, ovate leaves and produces small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically in lowland rainforests. The plant is notable for its role in traditional medicine and its ecological significance in its native habitats.
